A huge bot woke up to find himself laying on the ground doing nothing.  He =
rubbed a bunch of dust and dirt off of him, and then looked around.  His si=
ght was blurry for a brief moment, but then he made out what was....Maximal=
 City!  It all came back to him why he was here.....He had been fighting in=
 a battle.....The Alliance and the Maximals were fighting the Decepticons a=
nd perhaps a few other enemies....Yes that was it!  But, the Maximal base l=
ooked different.  It just wasn't the Cybertronian Fire anymore.  But Surgit=
al wasn't in a hostile attacking mode or mood.  He just wanted to know how =
long he'd been out and wanted to get back to the Dark Avian and see Megatro=
n.  Surgital split into the Bodicons(ok, need to remember their names! Lol)=
, Headshot, Decapitron, Explobody, Legtrap, and Gutclaw.  They all headed b=
ack to the Dark Avian.



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~LurkerAbyss~~~~~~~=

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~The Keeper Of Souls~
~The Shadow Of The Dark~
~I =
Am The Lurker Of The Abyss~
